Name: Vieux Navine
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: An apple spirit influenced Sweet Manhattan -style cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Patrick Brennan at Prospect, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Vieux Navine contains 194 calories
